game.name: Lilialette's Hustle: Getting My Hands Dirty to Save My Guild
game.shortDescription: Lilialette loves life as a guild receptionist, but between the upcoming guild merger and budget cuts, she might be getting fired soon! Help Lilialette get into gear and take on quests to turn her F-Rank guild into a bustling hub for adventurers... and save her dream job, of course!
